sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Win her and take her, or, Old fools will be medling a comedy as it is acted at the Theatre-royall / by Their Majesties servants. Smith, Mr. (John), 1662-1717. Underhill, Cave, 1634-1710?
[7], 60 p.
Printed for J. Hindmarsh [etc.], London : 1691.
"Ascribed to John Smith (or Smyth) of Magdalen college, Oxford, but the dedication is signed by Cave Underhill, the actor, to whom the Epilogue indicates the play was given by the author"--LCCPC. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
=======

"Ascribed to John Smith (or Smyth) of Magdalen college, Oxford, but the dedication is signed by Cave Underhill, the actor, to whom the Epilogue indicates the play was given by the author"--LCCPC. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
